org.apache.flink.runtime.blob

类 FileSystemBlobStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.blob.FileSystemBlobStore
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, BlobStore, BlobStoreService, BlobView

    public class FileSystemBlobStore
extends java.lang.Object
implements BlobStoreService
    Blob store backed by FileSystem.

    This is used in addition to the local blob storage for high availability.

    • 字段概要

    • 方法详细资料

      • put

        public boolean put(java.io.File localFile,
                   JobID jobId,
                   BlobKey blobKey)
            throws java.io.IOException
        从接口复制的说明: BlobStore
        Copies the local file to the blob store.
        指定者:
        put 在接口中 BlobStore
        参数:
        localFile - The file to copy
        jobId - ID of the job this blob belongs to (or null if job-unrelated)
        blobKey - The ID for the file in the blob store
        返回:
        whether the file was copied (true) or not (false)
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - If the copy fails

      • put

             throws java.io.IOException

        public boolean get(JobID jobId,
                   BlobKey blobKey,
                   java.io.File localFile)
            throws java.io.IOException
        从接口复制的说明: BlobView
        Copies a blob to a local file.
        指定者:
        get 在接口中 BlobView
        参数:
        jobId - ID of the job this blob belongs to (or null if job-unrelated)
        blobKey - The blob ID
        localFile - The local file to copy to
        返回:
        whether the file was copied (true) or not (false)
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - If the copy fails

      • delete

        public boolean delete(JobID jobId,
                      BlobKey blobKey)
        从接口复制的说明: BlobStore
        Tries to delete a blob from storage.

        NOTE: This also tries to delete any created directories if empty.

        指定者:
        delete 在接口中 BlobStore
        参数:
        jobId - ID of the job this blob belongs to (or null if job-unrelated)
        blobKey - The blob ID
        返回:
        true if the given blob is successfully deleted or non-existing; false otherwise

      • deleteAll

        public boolean deleteAll(JobID jobId)
        从接口复制的说明: BlobStore
        Tries to delete all blobs for the given job from storage.

        NOTE: This also tries to delete any created directories if empty.

        指定者:
        deleteAll 在接口中 BlobStore
        参数:
        jobId - The JobID part of all blobs to delete
        返回:
        true if the job directory is successfully deleted or non-existing; false otherwise

      • delete

        private boolean delete(java.lang.String blobPath)

      • closeAndCleanupAllData

        public void closeAndCleanupAllData()
        从接口复制的说明: BlobStoreService
        Closes and cleans up the store. This entails the deletion of all blobs.
        指定者:
        closeAndCleanupAllData 在接口中 BlobStoreService
